title: Spaceship Skylab: wings of discovery
creator_credit: United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration and AV Corporation
brief_description: A documentary film on the Skylab Spacestation comprising a montage of still and live footage emphasising its scientific attributes. A giant solar telescope, Earth resources experiments, a materials processing furnace, medical experiment facilities, pollution research and observation and geological analysis all make Skylab an instrument of experiment and discovery.
